data.name: Grove: Nostalgia's End
data.detailed_description:
- A massive 16bit journey across time and space.
- Lovingly created worlds and characters.
- Uncover a deep unfolding plot in a wild universe!
- An epic main storyline and loads of side quests and content.
- Find Secrets, collectables, and loot hidden throughout the worlds.





- Travel from the gritty streets of Vapor City to fantasy worlds on the
other side of the universe.
- 4 planned story chapters.
- A 20+ hour adventure inspired by classic 16bit rpg's and 80's and
90's movie nostalgia.
- Interact with hundreds of characters, including the cast of playable
party members you must work with throughout your journey.





- Multiple massive sprawling world maps to explore.
- Different world maps for different chapters.
- Massive focus on exploration and hidden secrets.
- Each explorable location filled with detail and independent story content.
- Massive planned diversity of locations. Rainy cities, fantasy forests, dark dungeons,
hidden reality's, alternate dimensions, steampunk castles, and MORE!





- Music is deeply connected to the central theme of the game.
- A completely immersive soundtrack, with hundreds of originally composed, and carefully
selected tracks of retro funky synthwave, classic video game nostalgia, heavy metal, and more!
- Atmospheric sound design for each locations environmental ambience.



-COMBAT-

- No random encounters. Enemies are visible on the map. It's your choice whether to
grind out extra levels and rewards, or progress the story content.
- Each character has a unique fighting style that compliments Alex's abilities.
- Resonance shifting skills that utilize memories to empower abilities.
- Hundreds of weapons, armor, and accessories to unlock for each character.
- Diverse attacks and skills to unleash in classic active turn based battles.

data.short_description: A story rich retro RPG adventure with a lot of attitude! Life in Vapor City was always strange, but after the arrival of a mysterious record, Alex and Eddie's lives are about to change forever.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 (32-bit/64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: %100 DirectX 9 compatible
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 resolution capable monitor
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 10 (32-bit/64-bit) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Sound Card: %100 DirectX 9 compatible
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 resolution capable monitor
